Neither any Loan Party nor any of its Subsidiaries nor any general partner or managing member of any Loan Party, as applicable, is an Affected Financial Institution.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_538"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ie3a52184bfee4f7cb5c4df4d25d4b54e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.15</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Unencumbered Asset Conditions</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Each Unencumbered Asset satisfies all Unencumbered Asset Conditions (except as may have been waived in writing by the Required Lenders).</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_541"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ibd764b7a2d6143afa2c857089a0cfb4b"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.16</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Employee Benefit Plans</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Except as would not reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect, Borrower and each ERISA Affiliate that is subject to ERISA has fulfilled its obligation, if any, under the minimum funding standards of ERISA and the Code with respect to each Plan and is in compliance in all material respects with the presently </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">87</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">applicable provisions of ERISA and the Code with respect to each Plan. Except as would not reasonably be likely to result in a Material Adverse Effect, neither Borrower nor any ERISA Affiliate has (a) sought a waiver of the minimum funding standard under Section 412 of the Code in respect of any Multiemployer Plan or Plan or (b) incurred any liability under Title IV of ERISA other than a liability to the PBGC for premiums under Section 4007 of ERISA. Neither Borrower nor any ERISA Affiliate has failed to make any contribution or payment to any Multiemployer Plan or Plan, or made any amendment to any Plan, which has resulted or would reasonably be likely to result in the imposition of a Lien. None of the Unencumbered Assets constitutes a &#8220;plan asset&#8221; of any Plan that is subject to ERISA.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_544"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i3ddb14a2ac3b467eb18ed432d39b642e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.17</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Disclosure</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. All information, taken as a whole, contained in this Agreement, the other Loan Documents or otherwise furnished to or made available to Agent or Lenders by Borrower or any Guarantor (other than projections, estimates, budgets, and other forward-looking information), is and will be, to the best of Borrower&#8217;s or Guarantors&#8217; knowledge, true and correct in all material respects and does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements contained therein not materially misleading when taken as a whole.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_547"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i06df0e1a9b7e4dc4a780c29243e4eaa1"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.18</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Place of Business</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The principal place of business of Borrower and each other Loan Party, as of the Closing Date, is 1835 Market Street, Suite 2601, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19103.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_550"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i10a20c72c8d94793813c96f40d3bcca6"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.19</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Regulations T, U and X</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. No portion of any Loan is to be used for the purpose of purchasing or carrying any &#8220;margin security&#8221; or &#8220;margin stock&#8221; as such terms are used in Regulations T, U and X of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, 12 C.F.R. Parts 220, 221 and 224. No Loan Party is engaged, nor will it engage, principally or as one of its important activities, in the business of extending credit for the purpose of purchasing or carrying any &#8220;margin security&#8221; or &#8220;margin stock&#8221; as such terms are used in Regulations T, U and X of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, 12 C.F.R. Parts 220, 221 and 224.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_553"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ib1a7d390e6a3468ea328dc455a925f41"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.20</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Environmental Compliance</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The members of the Consolidated Group have conducted in the ordinary course of business a review of the effect of the existing Environmental Laws and claims alleging potential liability or responsibility for violation of the Environmental Laws on their respective businesses, operations and properties, and as a result thereof have reasonably concluded that, except as specifically disclosed on Schedule 6.20, such Environmental Laws and claims could not, individually or in the aggregate, reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_556"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i9469464383e142b4abc29c670dbdee14"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.21</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Subsidiaries&#59; Organizational Structure</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Schedule 6.21(a) sets forth, as of the Closing Date, all of the Unencumbered Asset Subsidiaries, the form and jurisdiction of organization of such Subsidiary Guarantors and Unencumbered Asset Subsidiaries, and the owners of the direct ownership interests therein. On the Closing Date, no Person owns any legal, equitable or beneficial interest in any of the Subsidiary Guarantors or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiaries except as set forth on such Schedule. As of the Closing Date, Parent Guarantor owns in excess of 97% of the Equity Interests in Borrower.  As of the Closing Date, there are no Subsidiary Guarantors, but if any Subsidiary Guarantors are added during the term of this Agreement, Schedule 6.21(a) shall be updated to include information regarding such Subsidiary Guarantors.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_559"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="icf14ddd7971848428712a2c0e141a219"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.22</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Rent Rolls</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. An accurate and complete Rent Roll in all material respects as of the date of inclusion of each Multifamily Property as an Unencumbered Asset with respect to all Leases of any portion of such Unencumbered Asset has been provided to Agent.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">88</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_562"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i34bcb178d5024f0c921de96a19d83209"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.23</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Property.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%"> Except as set forth in Schedule 6.23, to the knowledge of the Loan Parties all of the Unencumbered Assets, and all major building systems located thereon, are structurally sound, in good condition and working order and free from material defects, subject to ordinary wear and tear and damage from casualty or condemnation, except for such portion of such Real Estate which is not occupied by any tenant and which may not be in final working order pending final build-out of such space, and except where such defects have not had and would not reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect. To the knowledge of the Loan Parties, there are no material unpaid or outstanding real estate or other taxes or assessments on or against any of the Unencumbered Assets which are payable by any Loan Party or any Unencumbered Asset Owner (except only real estate or other taxes or assessments, that are not yet delinquent or are being protested as permitted by this Agreement). Except as otherwise disclosed to Agent in writing, to the knowledge of the Loan Parties there are no pending, or threatened or contemplated, eminent domain proceedings against any of the Unencumbered Assets. Except as otherwise disclosed to Agent in writing, to the knowledge of the Loan Parties, none of the Unencumbered Assets is now damaged as a result of any fire, explosion, accident, flood or other casualty, except in cases that would not reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect. To the knowledge of the Loan Parties, no Person has any right or option to acquire any Unencumbered Asset or any Building thereon or any portion thereof or interest therein, except as set forth in Schedule 6.23.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_565"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i0adea9472a084d738fea342538b1c861"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.24</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Brokers</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Neither Borrower nor any of its Subsidiaries has engaged or otherwise dealt with any broker, finder or similar entity in connection with this Agreement or the Loans contemplated hereunder.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_568"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i4546438108134a34ac4a42652b6d8b6e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.25</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Other Debt</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Without limiting the provisions of &#167;8.1 or &#167;8.2, none of the Loan Parties is a party to or bound by any agreement, instrument or indenture that requires the subordination in right or time or payment of any of the Obligations to any other Indebtedness of any Loan Party.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_571"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i2f108e78dfce4db1aeea62791ce3a48d"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.26</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Solvency</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. As of the Closing Date and after giving effect to the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the other Loan Documents, including all Loans made or to be made hereunder, and, including, without limitation the provisions of &#167;38 hereof, the Loan Parties, taken as a whole, are Solvent.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_574"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ibda8c3091be7443ba2a1acadf7f91485"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.27</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">No Bankruptcy Filing</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. As of the Closing Date, no Loan Party or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary is contemplating either the filing of a petition by it under any state or federal bankruptcy or insolvency laws or the liquidation of its assets or property, and the Loan Parties have no knowledge of any Person contemplating the filing of any such petition against such Loan Party or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_577"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i6928939edf1749b08153fc0a6f83a0cb"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.28</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">No Fraudulent Intent</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Neither the execution and delivery of this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents nor the performance of any actions required hereunder or thereunder is being undertaken by any Loan Party with or as a result of any actual intent by any of such Persons to hinder, delay or defraud any entity to which any of such Persons is now or will hereafter become indebted.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_580"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i37e23b2801b4474c89866c074861481a"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.29</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Transaction in Best Interests of Loan Parties&#59; Consideration</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The transaction evidenced by this Agreement and the other Loan Documents is in the best interests of each Loan Party. The direct and indirect benefits to inure to the Loan Parties pursuant to this Agreement and the other Loan Documents constitute at least &#8220;reasonably equivalent value&#8221; (as such term is used in &#167;548 of the Bankruptcy Code) and &#8220;valuable consideration,&#8221; &#8220;fair value,&#8221; and &#8220;fair consideration,&#8221; (as such terms are used in any applicable state fraudulent conveyance law), in exchange for the benefits to be provided by the Loan Parties pursuant to this Agreement and the other Loan Documents, and but for the willingness of each Guarantor to guarantee the Loan, </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">89</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">Borrower would be unable to obtain the financing contemplated hereunder which financing will enable Borrower to have available financing to conduct and expand its business. The Loan Parties further acknowledge and agree that the Loan Parties constitute a single integrated and common enterprise and that each receives a benefit from the availability of credit under this Agreement.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_583"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i1da8478556d1429198d070b1df79ea2a"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.30</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">OFAC</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. None of any Loan Party or any of its respective directors, officers, employees, Affiliates or any agent or representative of the Loan Parties or any Subsidiary while  acting in any capacity in connection with or benefit from this Agreement, is (or will be) (i) a Sanctioned Person, (ii) located, organized or resident, or has its assets located, in a Designated Jurisdiction, (iii) engaged in any transaction with any Sanctioned Person or any Person who is located, organized or resident in any Designated Jurisdiction to the extent that such transactions would violate Sanctions, or (iv) has violated any Anti-Money Laundering Law in any material respect.  No Loan, nor the proceeds from any Loan, has been used for, directly or indirectly, or has otherwise been made available to fund any unlawful activity or business in any Designated Jurisdiction or to fund any unlawful activity or business with any Sanctioned Person, or in any other manner that will result in a violation by any Loan Party or Subsidiary thereof, or any Lender or the Agent, of Sanctions.  Neither the making of the Loans nor the use of proceeds thereof will violate the International Emergency Economic Powers Act. the Trading with the Enemy Act, as amended, or any of the foreign assets control regulations of the United States Treasury Department (31 C.F.R., Subtitle B, Chapter V, as amended) or any enabling legislation or executive order relating thereto or successor statute thereto.  Each of the Loan Parties and its Subsidiaries, and to the knowledge of the Loan Parties, each director, officer, employee, agent and Affiliate of the Loan Parties and each such Subsidiary, is in compliance with the Anti-Corruption Laws in all material respects.  The Loan Parties have implemented and maintain in effect policies and procedures designed to ensure compliance with the Anti-Corruption Laws and applicable Sanctions by the Loan Parties, their Subsidiaries, their respective directors, officers, employees, Affiliates and agents and representatives of the Loan Parties or any Subsidiary that will act in any capacity in connection with or benefit from this Agreement.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_586"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i47a214ab415b4eee83cfa3be68c24f8e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;6.31</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">REIT Status</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Parent Guarantor is qualified to elect or has elected status as a real estate investment trust under Section 856 of the Code and currently is in compliance in all material respects with all provisions of the Code applicable to the qualification of Parent Guarantor as a real estate investment trust.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_589"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="i8b851aacc6e64de7bf5a4df4ffb6ce76"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:21pt">AFFIRMATIVE COVENANTS</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">Each of the Loan Parties covenants and agrees that, so long as any Loan, Letter of Credit, or Note is outstanding or any Lender has any obligation to make any Loans (or participate in the issuance of any Letter of Credit)&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_592"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="id8f578bc968d468cb7ba6613f27e9b75"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Punctual Payment</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will duly and punctually pay or use commercially reasonable efforts to cause to be paid (but without limiting the provisions of &#167;4.12, &#167;12.1(a), and&#47;or &#167;12.1(b)) the principal and interest on the Loans and all interest and fees provided for in this Agreement, all in accordance with the terms of this Agreement and the Notes, as well as all other sums owing pursuant to the Loan Documents in accordance with the terms hereof.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_595"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i53d45e580d434fd08c82956945157dda"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Maintenance of Office</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Loan Parties will maintain their respective chief executive office at 1835 Market Street, Suite 2601, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19103, or at such other place in the United States of America as the Loan Parties shall designate upon prompt written notice to Agent, where notices, presentations and demands to or upon the Loan Parties in respect of the Loan Documents may be given or made.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">90</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_598"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i62588f99a1c7447598f3cd006cbc1c3d"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Records and Accounts</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Loan Parties will (a) keep, and cause each of their respective Subsidiaries to keep true and accurate records and books of account in which full, true and correct entries will be made in accordance with GAAP (in each case, in all material respects) and (b) maintain, in all material respects in accordance with GAAP, adequate accounts and reserves for the payment of all Taxes (including income taxes) , depreciation and amortization of its properties and the properties of their respective Subsidiaries, contingencies and other reserves. Neither Borrower nor any of its Subsidiaries shall, without the prior written consent of Agent which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed (x) make any material change to the accounting policies&#47;principles used by such Person in preparing the financial statements and other information described in &#167;6.4 or &#167;7.4 (unless required or permitted by GAAP or other applicable accounting standards), or (y) change its fiscal year.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_601"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i1fa8bd22e8a946b1b62c96e31757b726"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.4</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Financial Statements, Certificates and Information</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will deliver or cause to be delivered to Agent which Agent shall promptly deliver to each Lender&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_604"></div><div Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">not later than one hundred twenty (120) days after the end of each fiscal year, the audited Consolidated balance sheet of Parent Guarantor and its Subsidiaries at the end of such fiscal year, and the related audited Consolidated statements of income, and cash flows for such year, setting forth in comparative form the figures for the previous fiscal year and all such statements to be in reasonable detail, prepared in accordance with GAAP, and accompanied by an auditor&#8217;s report and opinion prepared without qualification as to the scope of the audit by KPMG or another nationally recognized accounting firm, and any other information Agent may reasonably request to complete a financial analysis of Borrower and its Subsidiaries&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_607"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font (or ninety (90) days in the case of fiscal year end) of each fiscal year, copies of the unaudited Consolidated balance sheet of Parent Guarantor and its Subsidiaries as at the end of such fiscal quarter, and the related unaudited Consolidated statements of income and cash flows for the portion of Parent Guarantor&#8217;s fiscal year then elapsed, all in reasonable detail and prepared in all material respects in accordance with GAAP, together with a certification on behalf of Borrower by an Authorized Officer that the information contained in such financial statements fairly presents in all material respects the financial position of Parent Guarantor and its Subsidiaries on the date thereof (subject to year-end adjustments and the absence of footnotes)&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_610"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i8ef389581aa94923a2c7c8a4cfb62583"></font><font
