Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">simultaneously with the delivery of the financial statements referred to in subsections (a) and (b) above a statement (a &#8220;Compliance Certificate&#8221;) certified on behalf of Parent Guarantor by an Authorized Officer of Parent Guarantor in the form of Exhibit G hereto (or in such other form as Agent may reasonably approve from time to time) setting forth in reasonable detail computations evidencing compliance or non-compliance (as the case may be) with the covenants contained in &#167;9. All income, expense, debt and value associated with Real Estate or other Investments acquired or disposed of during any fiscal quarter will be added or eliminated from calculations, on a Pro Forma Basis, where applicable. The Compliance Certificate shall be accompanied by copies of the statements of Consolidated Asset NOI for such fiscal quarter for each of the Unencumbered Assets, prepared on a basis materially consistent with the statements furnished to Agent prior to the date hereof and otherwise in form reasonably satisfactory to Agent, together with a certification on behalf of Parent Guarantor by an Authorized Officer that the information contained in such statement fairly presents in all material respects Consolidated Asset NOI of the Unencumbered Assets for such periods&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_613"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="idf72d496734a40129693117f78a15a16"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(d)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">promptly upon Borrower becoming aware of any change in the Parent Guarantor&#8217;s Debt Rating or any other credit rating given by any Rating Agency or any announcement that any such rating is &#8220;under review&#8221; or that such rating has been placed on a watch list or that any similar action has been taken by any Rating Agency, notice of such change, announcement or action&#59;</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">91</font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_616"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i220fb75424a942129fe1460df4783dcd"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(e)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">simultaneously with the delivery of the financial statements referred to in subsections (a) and (b) above, (i) a Rent Roll for each of the Unencumbered Assets and a summary thereof in form reasonably satisfactory to Agent as of the end of each fiscal quarter (including the fourth calendar quarter in each year), and (ii) an operating statement for each of the Unencumbered Assets for each such fiscal quarter and year to date and a consolidated operating statement for the Unencumbered Assets for each such calendar quarter and year to date (such statements and reports to be in form reasonably satisfactory to Agent), including (if requested by Agent) a receivables aging report, it being agreed that the forms of the Rent Rolls and the operating statements being provided under the Existing Credit Agreement are satisfactory&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_619"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i4465e9bd8a1d4a748007c6950d771f52"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(f)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.03pt">simultaneously with the delivery of the financial statements referred to in subsections (a) and (b) above, upon reasonable request by Agent, a statement (i) listing the Unencumbered Assets owned by Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries including the property name, location, number of units, Total Consolidated Operating Property Value (including the applicable methodology for calculating value), and any applicable indebtedness secured thereby&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_622"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i4fc2851a19924924b8bc27abd981d4a7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(g)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">&#91;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;text-decoration:underline">Reserved</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#93;&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_625"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i7009ee3bfe394ab781d544863d4befdc"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(h)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">from time to time such other financial data and information in the possession of the Loan Parties (including without limitation finalized auditors&#8217; management letters, status of material litigation or material investigations against the Loan Parties and any settlement discussions relating thereto (unless the Loan Parties in good faith believe that such disclosure could result in a waiver or loss of attorney work product, attorney-client or any other applicable privilege), property inspection and environmental reports with respect to the Unencumbered Assets and information as to zoning and other legal and regulatory changes affecting the Unencumbered Assets) as Agent or any of the Lenders may reasonably request.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">Any material to be delivered pursuant to this &#167;7.4 may be delivered electronically directly to Agent or made available to Agent pursuant to an accessible website and Lenders provided that such material is in a format reasonably acceptable to Agent, and such material shall be deemed to have been delivered to Agent and Lenders upon Agent&#8217;s receipt thereof or access to the website containing such material. Upon the request of Agent, the Loan Parties shall deliver paper copies thereof to Agent and Lenders. The Loan Parties authorize Agent and Arrangers to disseminate any such materials through the use of Intralinks, SyndTrak or any other electronic information dissemination system, and the Loan Parties release Agent and Lenders from any liability in connection therewith (other than the liability based on Agent&#8217;s gross negligence or willful misconduct). Delivery of a copy of the annual or quarterly, as applicable, financial statements of Parent Guarantor filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission shall satisfy the requirements of &#167;7.4(a) or &#167;7.4(b), as applicable.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_628"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i5dc6f96169404667afc4e566b66cbbd8"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.5</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Notices</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_631"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i9f1d1e0a3fc14a32bb46f6f6b525c796"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt;text-decoration:underline">Defaults</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will promptly upon becoming aware of same notify Agent in writing of the occurrence of any Default or Event of Default, which notice shall describe such occurrence with reasonable specificity and shall state that such notice is a &#8220;notice of default&#8221;. If any Person shall give any written notice or take any other action in respect of a claimed default (whether or not constituting an Event of Default) under this Agreement or under any note, evidence of indebtedness, indenture or other obligation to which or with respect to which any Loan Party or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary is a party or obligor, whether as principal or surety, and such default would permit the holder of such note or obligation or other </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">92</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">evidence of indebtedness to accelerate the maturity thereof, which acceleration would be reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect, Borrower shall forthwith give written notice thereof to Agent and each Lender, describing the notice or action and the nature of the claimed default.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_634"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i7f4a2ad4a6b94c63af1041edaf0ab568"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt;text-decoration:underline">Environmental Events</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will give notice to Agent within five (5) Business Days of becoming aware of (i) any potential or known Release, or threat of Release, of any Hazardous Substances in violation of any applicable Environmental Law&#59; (ii) any violation of any Environmental Law that Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries reports in writing or is reportable by such Person in writing (or for which any written report supplemental to any oral report is made) to any federal, state or local environmental agency or (iii) any inquiry, proceeding, investigation, or other action including a notice from any agency of potential environmental liability, of any federal, state or local environmental agency or board, that in the case of either clauses (i) &#8211; (iii) above involves any Unencumbered Asset and would reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_637"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="ia898688c3c7a462c9383d918603a6b0b"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(c)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt;text-decoration:underline">Notification of Claims Against Unencumbered Assets</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will give notice to Agent in writing within five (5) Business Days of Borrower or any Unencumbered Asset Owner becoming aware of any material setoff, claims (including, with respect to the Unencumbered Assets, environmental claims), withholdings or other defenses to which any of the Unencumbered Assets are subject, in each case which would be reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_640"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="icda32c0cd92848ad80bac4b3bfcac2b7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(d)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt;text-decoration:underline">Notice of Litigation and Judgments</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will give notice to Agent in writing within five (5) Business Days of Borrower or any Subsidiary Guarantor or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary becoming aware of any litigation or proceedings threatened in writing or any pending litigation and proceedings affecting any Loan Party or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary or to which any Loan Party or any of its Subsidiaries is a party involving an uninsured claim against Borrower or any Subsidiary Guarantor or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary that could reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect and stating the nature and status of such litigation or proceedings. Borrower will give notice to Agent, in writing, in form and detail reasonably satisfactory to Agent within ten (10) days of any single judgment not covered by insurance, whether final or otherwise, against Borrower, any Subsidiary Guarantor, or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary in an amount in excess of $15,000,000.00.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_643"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i5fc2e4dd0f5045e69a6355716821466b"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(e)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt;text-decoration:underline">ERISA</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will give notice to Agent within ten (10) Business Days after Borrower or any ERISA Affiliate (i) gives or is required to give notice to the PBGC of any ERISA Reportable Event with respect to any Plan, or knows that the plan administrator of any such Plan has given or is required to give notice of any such reportable event&#59; (ii) gives a copy of any notice (including any received from the trustee of a Multiemployer Plan) of complete or partial withdrawal liability under Title IV of ERISA&#59; or (iii) receives any notice from the PBGC under Title IV or ERISA of an intent to terminate or appoint a trustee to administer any such plan, in each case if such event or occurrence would reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_646"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="if16a3ee8820a4188af3a5bfa3d68204e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(f)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.03pt;text-decoration:underline">Notice of Takings and Casualty</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will give notice to Agent in writing within five (5) Business Days of Borrower or any of Unencumbered Asset Owner becoming aware of any casualty or Taking affecting any Unencumbered Asset that is reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect, stating the nature and status of such casualty or Taking.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_649"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i4d01a61322994d5794e43dcc636d0646"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(g)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt;text-decoration:underline">Notification of Lenders</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Within five (5) Business Days after receiving any notice under this &#167;7.5, Agent will forward a copy thereof to each Lender, together with copies of any certificates or other written information that accompanied such notice.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">93</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_652"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i9c93dae38bc9431e8331011f12215125"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.6</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Existence&#59; Maintenance of Properties</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_655"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="iba478a4086e84d8e9a4a22abc46b2713"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">The Loan Parties will preserve and keep in full force and effect their legal existence in the jurisdiction of its incorporation or formation except where failure to do so would not be reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect. Borrower will, and will cause each Unencumbered Asset Owner to, preserve and keep in full force and effect all of their rights (charter and statutory) and franchises necessary or desirable in the normal conduct of their respective businesses, except where failure to do so would not be reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect (it being understood that the foregoing shall not prohibit, or be violated as a result of, any addition or removal of an Unencumbered Asset permitted under &#167;5 hereof or any transactions by or involving any Loan Party otherwise permitted under &#167;8 hereof).</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_658"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="iae0376ce1daa408380052058869f8af1"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Borrower will, and will cause each Unencumbered Asset Owner to, (i) operate the Unencumbered Assets in a good and workmanlike manner and in all material respects in accordance with all Legal Requirements in accordance with such Person&#8217;s prudent business judgment, (ii) cause all of the Unencumbered Assets to be maintained and kept in good condition, repair and working order (ordinary wear and tear and casualty excepted) and supplied with all necessary equipment, and (iii) cause to be made all necessary repairs, renewals, replacements, betterments and improvements of such Unencumbered Asset, in each case under (i), (ii), or (iii) above in which the failure to do so would have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_661"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i92c89c7fc583448c9a4cb69a7e09b75e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.7</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Insurance</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_664"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="icf8e013f91aa4589bfea5edc5dca9276"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">Borrower will, and will cause each Unencumbered Asset Owner to, at their expense, procure and maintain insurance policies issued by such insurance companies, in such amounts, in such form and substance, and with such coverages, endorsements, deductibles and expiration dates as are reasonably acceptable to Agent, taking into consideration the property size, use, and location that a commercially prudent lender would require, providing the following types of insurance covering each Unencumbered Asset&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_667"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="i2bcb5099e2d0472694edd315cf2beb8d"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.69pt">All Risks&#8221; or &#8220;Special Form&#8221; property insurance, coverage from loss or damage arising from flood, earthquake, and acts of terrorism (with such coverage satisfactory to Agent), and comprehensive boiler and machinery or &#8220;breakdown&#8221; coverages) on each Building owned by Borrower and&#47;or the Unencumbered Asset Owners in an amount not less than the full insurable replacement cost of each Building. As approved by Agent in its reasonable discretion, flood, earthquake and boiler and machinery&#47;breakdown coverages may be subject to sublimits less than the Building&#8217;s insurable replacement cost. Losses shall be valued on a replacement cost basis, and coinsurance (if any) shall be waived. The deductibles shall not exceed $250,000.00 for physical damage, a 24-hour waiting period for business interruption and five percent (5%) of the insured value per location for earthquake or named windstorm. Full insurable replacement cost as used herein means the cost of replacing the Building (exclusive of the cost of excavations, foundations and footings below the lowest basement floor) without deduction for physical depreciation thereof&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_670"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="idaa0e44956a64ce592411cedf7424e3a"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(ii)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:21.36pt">If not covered by or under the terms or provisions of the policies required in clause (i) above, during the course of construction or repair of any Building or of any renovations or repairs that are not covered by Borrower&#8217;s or the Unencumbered Asset Owners&#8217; property insurance, the insurance required by clause (i) above shall be written on a builder&#8217;s risk, completed value, non-reporting form, with recovery not affected by interim reports of value submitted for premium accounting purposes, meeting all of the terms required by clause (i) above, covering the total value of work performed, materials, equipment, machinery and supplies furnished, existing structures, and temporary structures being erected on or near the Unencumbered Assets, including coverage against collapse and damage during transit or while </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">94</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">being stored off-site, and containing a soft costs (including loss of rents) coverage endorsement and a permission to occupy endorsement&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_673"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="ib3aaee7c88d54ce0899b1716baa01170"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(iii)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:18.03pt">If not insured by the flood insurance required under clause (i) above, flood insurance if at any time any Building is located in any federally designated &#8220;special hazard area&#8221; (including any area having special flood, mudslide and&#47;or flood-related erosion hazards, and shown on a Flood Hazard Boundary Map or a Flood Insurance Rate Map published by the Federal Emergency Management Agency as Zone A, AO, Al-30, AE, A99, AH, VO, V1-30, VE, V, M or E), in an amount equal to the full replacement cost or the maximum amount then available under the National Flood Insurance Program&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_676"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="i20cd25cccc234689a80a00025ccb204a"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(iv)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:18.69pt">Rent loss insurance in an amount sufficient to recover at least the total estimated gross receipts from all sources of income, including without limitation, rental income, for the Unencumbered Assets for a twelve (12) month period, including a provision for an extended period of indemnity of not less than one year&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_679"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="i7b8ac416e3c342d49fc587c98e6e1712"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(v)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Commercial general liability insurance against claims for bodily injury and property damage liability, on an occurrence basis, (including personal injury and advertising injury liability, contractual liability coverage, and completed operations coverage with a general aggregate limit of not less than $2,000,000.00, a completed operations aggregate limit of not less than $2,000,000.00, a combined single limit of not less than $1,000,000.00 per occurrence for bodily injury, and property damage liability, and a limit of not less than $1,000,000.00 for personal injury and advertising injury&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_682"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="i532e549c03b44f7eb0346ceb99c35037"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(vi)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:18.69pt">Umbrella liability insurance with limits of not less than $10,000,000.00 to be in excess of the limits of the insurance required by clause (v) above, with coverage at least as broad as the primary coverages, with any excess liability insurance to be at least as broad as the coverages of the lead umbrella policy. All such policies shall include language to provide defense coverage obligations&#59; and</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_685"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="ia808f4b628a8423ea29e01ec4f3ce41b"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(vii)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15.36pt">Such other insurance in such form and in such amounts as may from time to time be reasonably required by Agent against other insurable hazards and casualties which at the time are commonly insured against in the case of properties of similar character and location to the Unencumbered Assets.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">Borrower shall, and shall cause the Subsidiary Guarantors (if any) and Unencumbered Asset Owners to, pay all premiums on insurance policies.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_688"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i733aeb8f87164e29ba22754f1b3a353e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_691"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i2a719fb8c22e4c388fba569e7eb86bb8"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(c)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">The insurance required by this Agreement may be effected through a blanket policy or policies covering additional locations and property of Borrower, the Unencumbered Asset Owners and other Persons not included in the Unencumbered Assets, provided that such blanket policy or policies comply with all of the terms and provisions of this &#167;7.7 and contain endorsements or clauses assuring that any claim recovery will not be less than that which a separate policy would provide.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_694"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="idd5e3c894e34417499e0b0f72cddb010"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(d)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">All policies of insurance required by this Agreement shall be issued by companies authorized to do business in the State where the policy is issued and also in the States where the Unencumbered Asset is located and having a rating in Best&#8217;s Key Rating Guide of at least &#8220;A&#8221; and a financial size category of at least &#8220;X.&#8221;</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">95</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_697"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="ia8bd68c68b604cebb1cc9ac0c38780bf"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(e)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">None of Parent Guarantor or any Unencumbered Asset Owner shall carry separate insurance, concurrent in kind or form or contributing in the event of loss, with any insurance required under this Agreement unless such insurance complies with the terms and provisions of this &#167;7.7.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_700"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i89247312c7cc40aba8865532113cdfc6"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.8</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Taxes&#59; Liens</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will, and will cause the Unencumbered Asset Owners to, duly pay and discharge, or cause to be paid and discharged, before the same shall become delinquent, all material Taxes, material assessments and other material governmental charges imposed upon them or upon the Unencumbered Assets, as well as all material claims for labor, materials or supplies, that if unpaid might by law become a lien or charge upon any of the Unencumbered Assets or other material property of Borrower or the Unencumbered Asset Owners&#59; provided that any such Tax, assessment, charge or claim need not be paid if the validity or amount thereof shall currently be contested in good faith by appropriate proceedings which shall suspend the collection thereof with respect to such property (such that in the reasonable determination of Agent neither such property nor any portion thereof or interest therein would be in any danger of sale, forfeiture or loss by reason of such proceeding) and Borrower or Unencumbered Asset Owner shall have set aside on its books adequate reserves for such Tax, assessment, charge or claim in accordance with GAAP&#59; and provided, further, that forthwith upon the commencement of proceedings to foreclose any lien that may have attached as security therefor, Borrower or such Unencumbered Asset Owner either (i) will provide a bond issued by a surety reasonably acceptable to Agent and sufficient to stay all such proceedings or (ii) if no such bond is provided, will pay each such Tax, assessment, charge or claim. With respect to all other material Real Estate of the Consolidated Group, Borrower shall pay and discharge (or shall cause to be paid and discharged) as the same shall become due and payable all material Taxes, material assessments and other material governmental charges or claims upon it or its properties or assets, unless (a) the same are being contested in good faith by appropriate proceedings diligently conducted and adequate reserves in accordance with GAAP are being maintained by the Consolidated Group or (b) the failure to do so would not have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_703"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i60fe1825f8a54aa08590600fb0a150f4"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.9</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Inspection of Unencumbered Assets and Books</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will, and will cause the Unencumbered Asset Owners to, permit Agent and Lenders, at Borrower&#8217;s expense (subject to the limitation set forth below) and upon reasonable prior notice, to visit and inspect any of the Unencumbered Assets during normal business hours, to examine the books of account of the Borrowers (and to make copies thereof and extracts therefrom) and to discuss the affairs, finances and accounts of the Borrowers with, and to be advised as to the same by, their respective officers, partners or members, all at such reasonable times and intervals as Agent may reasonably request, provided that so long as no Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing, Borrower shall not be required to pay for such visits and inspections more often than once in any twelve (12) month period. Agent shall use good faith efforts to coordinate such visits and inspections so as to minimize the interference with and disruption to the normal business operations of Borrower and the Unencumbered Asset Owners.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_706"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i90233545557e4ec49af205d1b42bcf91"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.10</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Compliance with Laws, Contracts, Licenses, and Permits</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will, and will cause each Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary to, comply in all material respects with (i) all applicable laws (including without limitation Anti-Corruption Laws and applicable Sanctions) and regulations now or hereafter in effect wherever its business is conducted, (ii) the provisions of its corporate charter, partnership agreement, limited liability company agreement or declaration of trust, as the case may be, and other charter documents and bylaws, (iii) all agreements and instruments to which it is a party or by which it or any of its properties may be bound, (iv) all applicable decrees, orders, and judgments, and (v) all licenses and permits required by applicable laws and regulations for the conduct of its business or the ownership, use or operation of its properties, except where a failure to so comply with any of clauses (i) through (v) would not reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect. If any authorization, consent, approval, permit or license from any officer, agency or instrumentality of any </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">96</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">government shall become necessary or required in order that Borrower or its Subsidiaries may fulfill any of its obligations hereunder, Borrower or such Subsidiary will immediately take or cause to be taken all steps necessary to obtain such authorization, consent, approval, permit or license and furnish Agent and Lenders with evidence thereof, except to the extent any failure by Borrower or any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary to do so would not be reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect. Borrower and the Unencumbered Asset Subsidiaries shall develop and implement such programs, policies and procedures as are necessary to comply, in all material respects, with the Patriot Act and Anti-Corruption Laws.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_709"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ia0c853d6831e44279e5c5f01420c0179"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.11</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Further Assurances</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower and the Subsidiary Guarantors (if any) will, and will cause the Unencumbered Asset Subsidiaries to, cooperate with Agent and Lenders and execute such further instruments and documents as Agent may reasonably request to carry out to its reasonable satisfaction the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the other Loan Documents.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_712"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i41c17cf040e14316bbd8e7e735417eba"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.12</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Beneficial Ownership Certification</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.  Promptly following any change in beneficial ownership of Borrower that would render any statement in any existing Beneficial Ownership Certification untrue or inaccurate, Borrower will provide an updated Beneficial Ownership Certification for Borrower to Agent.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_715"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ie1a894d3881e413092ca17d072304284"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.13</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_718"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i67fc5bef69c246a9b846e10af9e2b9dc"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.14</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Business Operations</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Consolidated Group will not engage to any material extent in any business if, as a result, the general nature of the business in which the Consolidated Group, taken as a whole, would then be engaged would be substantially changed from the general nature of the business in which the Consolidated Group, taken as a whole, are engaged on the date of this Agreement.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_721"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ic4d2ae826fa449ce8aafbde0efa2831e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.15</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_724"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i6b385487186c400ab056808457ff43e1"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.16</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Ownership of Real Estate</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Without the prior written consent of Agent, the Unencumbered Asset of any Unencumbered Asset Owner shall not be owned or leased in any manner other than directly by such Unencumbered Asset Owner.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_727"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i331daa99958f45079184102a507f0af7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.17</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_730"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i998f932baa69455b9cc6a4a8ba83ca1e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.18</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Plan Assets</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower and the Subsidiary Guarantors (if any) shall, and shall cause each Unencumbered Asset Owner to, use commercially reasonable efforts to do, or cause to be done, all things necessary to ensure that none of the Unencumbered Assets will be deemed to be Plan Assets at any time.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_733"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ice2d30b3d64548e7bf054fdf9857f4d6"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.19</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Parent Guarantor Covenants</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower shall use commercially reasonable efforts to cause Parent Guarantor to comply with the following covenants (and by its execution and delivery of the Guaranty, Parent Guarantor covenants and agrees that)&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_736"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i55a6125b095f4024bd196c4dd1417b06"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">Parent Guarantor will not make or permit to be made, by voluntary or involuntary means, any transfer or encumbrance of its interest in Borrower which would result in a Change of Control&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_739"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="ie9e2a43386a94145a9e7e7f6724e67f4"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Parent Guarantor shall not dissolve, liquidate, Divide or otherwise wind-up its business, affairs or assets, except to the extent permitted by &#167;8.4&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_742"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="id386c1908df5470d92ae0989830e492c"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(c)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">Parent Guarantor shall maintain at least one class of common shares having trading privileges on the New York Stock Exchange or the NYSE MKT LLC or which is </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">97</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">the subject of price quotations in the over-the-counter market as reported by the National Association of Securities Dealers Automated Quotation System&#59; and</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_745"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i15b03b91fb734deea8abfcd04571061a"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(d)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Parent Guarantor will at all times comply with all applicable provisions of the Code necessary to allow Parent Guarantor to qualify for status as a real estate investment trust.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_748"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ice1c03766ed54b588a924b9654f54475"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.20</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Transactions With Affiliates</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Each Loan Party will conduct all transactions otherwise permitted under the Loan Documents with any of their Affiliates (other than transactions exclusively among or between the Loan Parties) on terms that are fair and reasonable and no less favorable, when taken as a whole, to such Loan Party than it would obtain in a comparable arm&#8217;s-length transaction with a Person not an Affiliate.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_751"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="iea3e77e430284c0ea8da892ffc008d21"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;7.21</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Keepwell</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Each Loan Party that is a Qualified ECP Loan Party at the time any Specified Loan Party either becomes jointly and severally liable for any Hedge Obligations pursuant to the terms of this Agreement, hereby jointly and severally, absolutely, unconditionally and irrevocably undertakes to provide such funds or other support to each Specified Loan Party with respect to such Hedge Obligation as may be needed by such Specified Loan Party from time to time to honor all of its obligations under the Loan Documents in respect of such Hedge Obligation (but, in each case, only up to the maximum amount of such liability that can be hereby incurred without rendering such Qualified ECP Loan Party&#8217;s obligations and undertakings hereunder voidable under applicable law relating to fraudulent conveyance or fraudulent transfer, and not for any greater amount). The obligations and undertakings of each Qualified ECP Loan Party under this paragraph shall remain in full force and effect until all Obligations have been paid in full, in cash. Each Loan Party intends this paragraph to constitute, and this paragraph shall be deemed to constitute, a &#8220;keepwell, support, or other agreement&#8221; for the benefit of, each Specified Loan Party for all purposes of the Commodity Exchange Act and applicable CFTC Regulations.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_754"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="i70bf33260cfe473089de0d2399225e27"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:21pt">NEGATIVE COVENANTS</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">Each of the Loan Parties covenants and agrees that, so long as any Loan, Letter of Credit, or Note is outstanding or any Lender has any obligation to make any Loans (or participate in the issuance of any Letter of Credit)&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_757"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ibe1a6bddb5514274a6a406fe30753fd7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Restrictions on Indebtedness</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">The Loan Parties will not, nor will they permit any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary to, create, incur, assume, guarantee or be or remain liable, contingently or otherwise, with respect to any Indebtedness other than&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_760"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="if993af4cd84f4dbbbcec40f9b323d101"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.69pt"> (x) Indebtedness to Lenders arising under any of the Loan Documents, (y) Hedge Obligations to a Lender Hedge Provider, and (z) Indebtedness to any counterparty other than a Lender Hedge Provider with respect to any Derivatives Contract made in the ordinary course of business (and not for speculative purposes)&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_763"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="ic88b8742404a40a0ad04d00eea4b810e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(ii)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:21.36pt">current liabilities incurred in the ordinary course of business but not incurred through (i) the borrowing of money, or (ii) the obtaining of credit except for credit on an open account basis customarily extended and in fact extended in connection with normal purchases of goods and services&#59;</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font and supplies to the extent that payment therefor shall not at the time be required to be made in accordance with the provisions of &#167;7.8&#59;</font></div><div Event of Default&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_772"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font of products or services, in each case incurred in the ordinary course of business&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_775"></div><div the ordinary course of business in connection with the construction or development of any Real Estate, including, without limitation, subdivision improvement agreements, development agreements, reimbursement agreements, infrastructure development agreements, agreements to construct or pay for on-site or off-site improvements and similar agreements incurred in the ordinary course of business in connection with the development of Real Estate or construction of infrastructure in connection therewith&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_778"></div><div (and subject to the limitations set forth) in &#167;9.5 and (b) Unsecured Recourse Indebtedness of the Loan Parties as and to the extent not prohibited (and subject to the limitations set forth) in &#167;9.9&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_781"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font Permitted Refinancing Indebtedness in respect of any such Indebtedness, (b) Indebtedness (including Capitalized Leases) financing the acquisition or replacement of equipment and, limited as to each of the Unencumbered Asset Owners, to $75,000.00 per fiscal year, and (c) intercompany Indebtedness of the Loan Parties outstanding from time to time&#59; provided that all such intercompany Indebtedness of any Loan Party owed to any Subsidiary of Parent Guarantor that is not a Loan Party shall be subordinated to the Obligations pursuant to an Intercompany Note&#59;</font></div><div Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary) (including, without limitation, any Indebtedness referred to in the proviso to the definition of Secured Recourse Indebtedness)&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_787"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="icef16594d4da4092861c1d0df904a030"></font><font permitted to be incurred pursuant to &#167;8.2(ix)&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_793"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font Parties (other than an Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary) in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 in the aggregate assumed in connection with an Investment not prohibited by this Agreement and any Permitted Refinancing Indebtedness incurred, issued or otherwise obtained to Refinance (in whole or in part) such Indebtedness&#59; provided that, (A) immediately after giving effect to such Indebtedness, no Event of Default exists or is continuing or would result therefrom, and (B) such Indebtedness is and remains solely the obligation of the Person and&#47;or such Person&#8217;s subsidiaries that are acquired and such Indebtedness was not incurred in anticipation of such Investment&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_796"></div><div receipt or similar facilities entered into in the ordinary course of business (including in respect of workers&#8217; compensation claims, health, disability or </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New permitted under this &#167;8.1(xiii)&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_799"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font this Agreement&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_802"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font not in connection with the borrowing of money&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_808"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font consultants or independent contractors of, Parent Guarantor and its Subsidiaries incurred in the ordinary course of business or in connection with any Investments not prohibited by this Agreement&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_811"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font case incurred in the ordinary course of business&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_814"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="ic4e6994bf9064f21b19739281f2ebcc5"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(xix)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:12.69pt">Indebtedness comprising take or pay obligations contained in supply agreements entered into the ordinary course of business&#59; and</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_817"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="i8ca0ba31dd3a42788a1e7d8571689871"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(xx)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:16.02pt">all customary premiums (if any), interest (including post-petition and capitalized interest), fees, expenses, charges and additional or contingent interest on obligations described in each of &#167;8.1(i) through &#167;8.1(xix) above.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_820"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="iae9ab1192410436992d4c67235544d63"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Restrictions on Liens, Etc.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Loan Parties, respectively and as applicable, will not, nor will they allow any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary, as applicable, to, (a) create or incur or suffer to be created or incurred or to exist any lien, security title, encumbrance, mortgage, pledge, Negative Pledge, charge, restriction, or other security interest of any kind upon (i) any direct or indirect Equity Interests in (A) any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary held by Borrower or IR OpCo, or (B) in Borrower held by Parent Guarantor, or (ii) any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary&#8217;s material respective property or assets of any character whether now owned or hereafter acquired, or upon such Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary&#8217;s interest in the income or profits therefrom&#59; (b) transfer (including by way of a Division) any of their material property or assets or the income or profits therefrom for the purpose of subjecting the same to the payment of Indebtedness or performance of any other material obligation in priority to payment of its general creditors&#59; (c) acquire, or agree or have an option to acquire, any property or assets upon conditional sale or other title retention or purchase money security agreement, device or arrangement&#59; (d) suffer to exist for a period of more than thirty (30) days after the same shall have been incurred any Indebtedness or claim or demand against any of them that if unpaid could by law or upon bankruptcy or insolvency, or otherwise, be given any priority whatsoever as to the Unencumbered Assets over any of their general creditors&#59; (e) sell, assign, pledge or otherwise transfer any accounts, contract rights, general intangibles, chattel paper or instruments, with or without recourse&#59; or (f) incur or maintain any obligation to any holder of Indebtedness of any of such Persons which prohibits the creation or maintenance of any lien securing the Obligations </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">100</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(collectively, &#8220;Liens&#8221;)&#59; provided that notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, the Loan Parties, respectively as applicable, may create or incur or suffer to be created or incurred or to exist&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_823"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="ifb38e673ab0e46ae8fe99f542abcd754"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.69pt">Liens on properties to secure taxes, assessments and other governmental charges (excluding any Lien imposed pursuant to any of the provisions of ERISA) or claims for labor, material or supplies incurred in the ordinary course of business, in each case to the extent not yet due or not overdue by more than sixty (60) days or are being contested in good faith and by appropriate proceedings diligently conducted with adequate reserves being maintained by the Loan Parties in accordance with GAAP or not otherwise required to be paid or discharged under the terms of this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_826"></div><div constituting Negative Pledges, Liens consisting of (1) contractual obligations that exist on the date hereof and any agreement evidencing any permitted renewal, extension or refinancing of such business, (4) contractual obligations that include Negative Pledges and restrictions on Liens in favor of any holder of </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div restrictions on Liens in favor of any holder of Indebtedness permitted under &#167;8.1 above (to the extent permitted to be incurred by a Subsidiary Guarantor), but solely to the extent any Negative subject thereto, (3) contractual obligations relating to secured Indebtedness permitted pursuant to &#167;8.1 above (to the extent permitted to be incurred by a Subsidiary Guarantor or Unencumbered contractual obligations that include customary provisions restricting assignment of any agreement entered into in the ordinary course of business, and (6) contractual obligations that include
