id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_886"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i868a2ca2fd6d48c6b8a7512aaab3fd0a"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_889"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i4067c1ccbd074410bcbc51e9d5163d97"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.4</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Merger, Consolidation</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. No Loan Party or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary will dissolve, liquidate, dispose of all or substantially all of its assets or business, merge, reorganize, Divide, consolidate or consummate any other business combination, in each case without the prior written consent of the Required Lenders, except (i) for the merger or consolidation of one or more of the Subsidiaries of Borrower (other than any Subsidiary that is a Subsidiary Guarantor or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary) with and into Borrower (it being understood and agreed that in any such event Borrower will be the surviving Person), (ii) for the merger or consolidation of two or more Subsidiaries of Borrower, (iii) for the merger or consolidation of two or more Subsidiary Guarantors, (iv) in connection with the removal of all Unencumbered Assets owned by a Subsidiary Guarantor or Unencumbered Asset Owner in accordance with &#167;5.3 or &#167;5.4 or (v) the merger or consolidation of Borrower or Parent Guarantor to the extent it does not result in a Change of Control.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_892"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ia7e5117ab9a04a99a3fccadd023f62bc"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.5</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_895"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ic904cc9df7f9420fb1ece6ecb161a4af"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.6</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Compliance with Environmental Laws</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower will not, nor will it permit any of Unencumbered Asset Owners to, do any of the following&#58; (a) use any of the Unencumbered Assets or any portion thereof as a facility for the handling, processing, storage or disposal of Hazardous Substances, except for quantities of Hazardous Substances used in the ordinary course </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">103</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">of such Subsidiary&#8217;s or its tenants&#8217; business and in material compliance with all applicable Environmental Laws, (b) cause or permit to be located on any of the Unencumbered Assets any underground tank or other underground storage receptacle for Hazardous Substances except in material compliance with Environmental Laws, (c) generate any Hazardous Substances on any of the Unencumbered Assets except in material compliance with Environmental Laws, (d) conduct any activity at any Unencumbered Assets or use any Unencumbered Assets in any manner that would reasonably be likely to cause a Release of Hazardous Substances on, upon or into the Unencumbered Assets or any surrounding properties which would reasonably be likely to give rise to material liability under SEMS or any other Environmental Law, or (e) directly or indirectly transport or arrange for the transport of any Hazardous Substances (except in compliance with all material Environmental Laws) in connection with any Unencumbered Assets, except, any such use, generation, conduct or other activity described in clauses (a) to (e) of this &#167;8.6 would not reasonably be likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">The Borrower shall cause the Unencumbered Asset Owners to&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_898"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="if9e87f278b9f443da2370539a927f554"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.69pt">in the event of any change in applicable Environmental Laws governing the assessment, release or removal of Hazardous Substances with respect to any Unencumbered Asset, take all reasonable action as required by such laws, and</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_901"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt"><font id="i42612b36ba6f498c9ad913c5e76bdb38"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(ii)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:21.36pt">if any Release or disposal of Hazardous Substances which Unencumbered Asset Owners are legally obligated to contain, correct or otherwise remediate shall occur or shall have occurred on any Unencumbered Asset (including without limitation any such Release or disposal occurring prior to the acquisition or leasing of such Unencumbered Asset by Borrower and the Unencumbered Asset Owners), Borrower or the relevant Unencumbered Asset Owner shall, after obtaining knowledge thereof, cause the performance of actions required by applicable Environmental Laws at the Unencumbered Asset in material compliance with all applicable Environmental Laws&#59; provided, that each of Borrower and the Unencumbered Asset Owner shall be deemed to be in compliance with Environmental Laws for the purpose of this clause (ii) so long as it or a responsible third party with sufficient financial resources is taking reasonable action to remediate or manage such event to the reasonable satisfaction of Agent or has taken and is diligently pursuing a challenge to any such alleged legal obligation through appropriate administrative or judicial proceedings. Agent may engage its own environmental consultant to review the environmental assessments and the compliance with the covenants contained herein.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_904"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i0be47f2b7c0b4192bfa8f16b3ccd56ae"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.7</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_907"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i845eb6a0d6fb4f01a0a4ecaab8bb8833"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.8</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Asset Sales</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Borrower will not permit any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary to sell, transfer or otherwise dispose of (including by way of a Division) any material asset unless (a) immediately after giving effect to such transaction, the Loan Parties&#8217; will be in compliance with the covenants contained in &#167;9 and (b) in the case of the sale, transfer or other disposal of an Unencumbered Asset, such sale, transfer or disposal is made in compliance with &#167;5.4.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_910"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="if036133af68c4479954d122860bb9c29"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.9</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_913"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i9635bc25c66c46959d6db49ea970d6e5"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.10</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Restriction on Prepayment of Indebtedness</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Borrower will not, nor will the Borrower allow any Subsidiary Guarantor or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary to, (a) voluntarily prepay, redeem, defease, purchase or otherwise retire the principal amount, in whole or in part, of any Indebtedness that is junior in right of payment to the Obligations, except in accordance with the subordination provisions applicable thereto&#59; provided, that the foregoing shall not prohibit (x) any Permitted Refinancing Indebtedness, (y) the prepayment, redemption, defeasance or other retirement of Indebtedness which is financed solely from the proceeds of a </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">104</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">new loan or external equity which would otherwise be permitted by the terms of &#167;8.1&#59; and (z) the prepayment, redemption, defeasance or other retirement of the principal of Indebtedness secured by Real Estate which is satisfied solely from the proceeds of a sale of the Real Estate securing such Indebtedness or external equity&#59; and (b) modify any document evidencing any Indebtedness that is junior in right of payment to the Obligations to accelerate the maturity date of such Indebtedness after the occurrence and during the continuance of an Event of Default.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_916"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i786629355667480682954e9c06e0035e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.11</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_919"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i2d91f5d3474c411a8626513809deb7af"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.12</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Derivatives Contracts</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. No Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary shall contract, create, incur, assume or suffer to exist any Derivatives Contracts except for Derivative Contracts made in the ordinary course of business and not prohibited pursuant to &#167;8.1 which are not secured by any Lien on any Unencumbered Asset or on the direct or indirect Equity Interests of any Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary. All Derivatives Contracts (including, without limitation, any and all guarantees provided in connection therewith) shall at all times be in compliance, in all material respects, with the Commodity Exchange Act and all CFTC Regulations.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_922"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i9d61b0f239104075bf276836577dde1f"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.13</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_925"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i19f9d05f6aac459a9616cb245f3ab364"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;8.14</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_928"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="ia59ad7c4ebae4d21ac97bd5f2d05070f"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:21pt">FINANCIAL COVENANTS</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">Each of the Loan Parties covenants and agrees that, so long as any Loan, Letter of Credit, or Note is outstanding or any Lender has any obligation to make any Loans (or participate in the issuance of any Letter of Credit), the Loan Parties shall comply with the following covenants, with such compliance being tested quarterly, as of the close of each fiscal quarter.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_931"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i0bc72bb6cbf74a69b28d61945035ed08"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Maximum Consolidated Leverage Ratio</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Consolidated Leverage Ratio shall not exceed sixty percent (60%)&#59; provided, however, that for up to two consecutive fiscal quarters following a Material Acquisition, the Consolidated Leverage Ratio may increase to, but may not exceed, sixty-five percent (65%).</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_934"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i960297a7f1364751a4404172bf6f36ac"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Minimum Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio shall not be less than 1.50 to 1.00, determined based on information for the most recent fiscal quarter annualized.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_937"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ic532d6b110754c2e9142def44b8df3b2"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_940"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ia5284150a6e34e48afaeb7deb3595c2f"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.4</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Maximum Distributions</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.  </font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_943"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="id80d2d5a71ba42158f0eef04e6455fa4"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">So long as no Default or Event of Default exists or would result therefrom, Parent Guarantor may declare or make cash Distributions to its shareholders. </font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_946"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="ife900385e052471081682d579c1ea6fa"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Notwithstanding the foregoing in clause (a) above, if a Default or Event of Default exists or would result therefrom, Borrower may declare and make cash Distributions to Parent Guarantor and other holders of partnership interests in Borrower with respect to any fiscal year only to the extent necessary for Parent Guarantor to distribute, and Parent Guarantor may so distribute, an aggregate amount not to exceed the minimum amount necessary for Parent Guarantor to maintain its status as a real estate investment trust and to avoid imposition of income or excise taxes under the Code&#59; </font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;text-decoration:underline">provided</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%"> that upon the occurrence of any Default or Event of Default specified in &#167;12.1(h), &#167;12.1(i) or &#167;12.1(j), or the acceleration of the maturity of any of the Obligations, neither Parent Guarantor nor Borrower shall make any Distributions.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">105</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_949"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i80325109abd5461bb790ffa84a8c4e52"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.5</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Maximum Secured Leverage Ratio</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Secured Leverage Ratio shall not exceed forty-five percent (45%).</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_952"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i52bb72c7ecb04a6a9606546320744951"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.6</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_955"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i81689164ac834804a74165fd44c15d71"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.7</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_958"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i40818244d6bc4fd2a4c176c1dff4be95"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.8</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">&#91;Reserved&#93;.  </font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_961"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ife0c98924fa2407aa50639f2d467d6db"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;9.9</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt;text-decoration:underline">Maximum Unsecured Leverage Ratio</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Unsecured Leverage Ratio shall not exceed sixty percent (60%)&#59; provided, however, that for up to two consecutive fiscal quarters following a Material Acquisition, the Unsecured Leverage Ratio may increase to, but may not exceed, sixty-five percent (65%).</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_964"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="ib8025a6d62934046997005f5311dbfa2"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">CLOSING CONDITIONS</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">The obligation of Lenders to make Loans on the Closing Date shall be subject to the satisfaction (or waiver) of the following conditions precedent&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_967"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i740c762189724a378b5457005f00d511"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Loan Documents</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Each of the Loan Documents shall have been duly executed and delivered by the respective parties thereto and shall be in full force and effect. Agent shall have received a fully executed counterpart of each such document.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_970"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i368312c122914d648c51d5756c30191e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Certified Copies of Organizational Documents</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent shall have received from each Loan Party (and for such constituent entities as is necessary to confirm each Loan Party&#8217;s authority to enter into the Loan Documents) a copy, certified as of a recent date by the appropriate officer of each State in which such Person is organized and in which the Unencumbered Assets are located and a duly authorized officer, partner or member of such Person, as applicable, to be true and complete, of the partnership agreement, corporate charter or operating agreement and&#47;or other organizational agreements of such Loan Party, as applicable, and its qualification to do business, as applicable, as in effect on such date of certification.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_973"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i4115a2c8e3a445a2b90ffcb84f9191e4"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Resolutions</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. All action on the part of Borrower and each Guarantor, as applicable, necessary for the valid execution, delivery and performance by such Person of this Agreement and the other Loan Documents to which such Person is or is to become a party shall have been duly and effectively taken, and evidence thereof reasonably satisfactory to Agent shall have been provided to Agent.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_976"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i3e642e827e494c4d9a4ae20d9427353f"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.4</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Incumbency Certificate&#59; Authorized Signers</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent shall have received from Borrower and each Guarantor an incumbency certificate, dated as of the Closing Date, signed by a duly authorized officer of such Person and giving the name and bearing a specimen signature of each individual who shall be authorized to sign, in the name and on behalf of such Person, each of the Loan Documents to which such Person is or is to become a party. Agent shall have also received from Borrower and each Guarantor a certificate, dated as of the Closing Date, signed by a duly authorized representative of Borrower and each Guarantor and giving the name and specimen signature of each Authorized Officer who shall be authorized to make Loan Requests and Conversion&#47;Continuation Requests and to give notices and to take other action on behalf of Borrower and each Guarantor under the Loan Documents.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_979"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="idc72dc13cd1141748ffe2322c976c33e"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.5</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Opinion of Counsel</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent shall have received an opinion addressed to Lenders and Agent and dated as of the Closing Date from counsel to the Loan Parties in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to Agent.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">106</font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_982"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i0fbcd089bfc94c008ff03436d9723ee6"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.6</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Payment of Fees</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Borrower shall have paid to Agent and Arrangers the fees payable pursuant to &#167;4.2.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_985"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i07da0fda1242403294c2b0f0ddcfadec"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.7</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Opinion of Agent&#8217;s Special Counsel</font></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">. Agent shall have received an opinion of Agent&#8217;s Special Counsel, in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to Agent.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_988"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ie39f638dd43f4e21bab543e2f4dd34a3"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.8</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Performance&#59; No Default</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The Loan Parties shall have performed and complied with all terms and conditions herein required to be performed or complied with by them on or prior to the Closing Date, and on the Closing Date there shall exist no Default or Event of Default and Borrower shall have delivered to Agent a certificate signed on behalf of Borrower by an Authorized Officer confirming the same.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_991"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i8ae3269e5a0b40df9488a91d188734b3"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.9</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Representations and Warranties</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The representations and warranties made by the Loan Parties in the Loan Documents or otherwise made by or on behalf of Borrower and its Subsidiaries in connection therewith or after the date thereof shall have been true and correct in all material respects when made and shall also be true and correct in all material respects on the Closing Date and Borrower shall have delivered to Agent a certificate signed on behalf of Borrower by an Authorized Officer confirming the same.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_994"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i9c656e101a28480cb8cb3937e9de4f62"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.10</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:3pt;text-decoration:underline">Proceedings and Documents</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. All proceedings in connection with the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the other Loan Documents shall be reasonably satisfactory to Agent and Agent&#8217;s counsel in form and substance, and Agent shall have received all information and such counterpart originals or certified copies of such documents and such other certificates, opinions, assurances, consents, approvals or documents as Agent and Agent&#8217;s counsel may reasonably require and are customarily required in connection with similar transactions.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_997"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ie18ab66482ba4f6fa2c01948e399f058"></font><font Ownership Regulation, in each case in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to such Lender and delivered at least five Business Days prior to the Closing Date.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1000"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i353bed849ed04f488103752c45e8d61d"></font><font Agent shall have received a Compliance Certificate and Availability Certificate dated as of the date of the Closing Date demonstrating compliance with each of the covenants calculated therein. Further, such Compliance Certificate shall include within the calculation of Consolidated Asset NOI for any Unencumbered Assets which have been owned for less than a calendar quarter, and shall be based upon financial data and information with respect to Unencumbered Assets as of the end of the most recent calendar month as to which data and information is available. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the financial ratios and tests set forth in &#167;9 (the &#8220;Specified Financial Covenants&#8221;), shall be calculated on a Pro Forma Basis in determining compliance of such Specified Financial Covenants as of the Closing Date&#59; provided, however, (1) in making any determination on a Pro Forma Basis, the calculations shall be made in good faith by an Authorized Officer of Borrower&#59; (2) determination of compliance with the Specified Financial Covenants on a Pro Forma Basis, as and when expressly provided above, shall not relate to any other or further date or period of determination with respect to compliance with such Specified Financial Covenants&#59; and (3) the foregoing shall not be deemed or construed to modify, amend, limit, waive, or suspect any of the Specified Financial Covenants, as further provided in &#167;9 or otherwise provided herein.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">107</font></div></div></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1003"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i8cd50d8cdaa749b0a8ebf4c7558fa368"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.13</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:3pt;text-decoration:underline">Release of Certain Subsidiaries from Private Placement Notes</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.  Agent shall have received evidence reasonably satisfactory to Agent that the entities that were Subsidiary Guarantors under the Existing Credit Agreement have been released from all obligations under that certain Note and Guaranty Agreement, dated as of August 19, 2024, by the Borrower, as issuer, the Parent Guarantor, as guarantor, and the holders from time to time of the private placement notes issued thereunder.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1006"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="ib3ee345496e845a5b88c669c0c50c6ba"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;10.14</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:3pt;text-decoration:underline">Consents</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. All conditions set forth in &#167;10 shall continue to be satisfied as of the date upon which any Loan is to be made, provided that this &#167;11.1 shall not require Borrower or any Guarantor to comply with the conditions set forth in &#167;10.2, &#167;10.3, &#167;10.4, and &#167;10.5 with respect to any Real Estate which has previously been included in the Unencumbered Assets.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1021"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i63c83c9920c24f68a4b3d9ac216c994d"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;11.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Representations True&#59; No Default</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. The representations and warranties made by Borrower and the Guarantors, respectively, in the Loan Documents shall be true and correct in all material respects on the date the Loan is made, both immediately before and after the Loan is made (it being understood and agreed that any representation or warranty which by its terms is made as of a specified date shall be required to be true and correct only as of such specified date) and no Default or Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1024"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i5a956208cc2a4d17a1a2f4549309c79c"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;11.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Borrowing Documents</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent shall have received a fully completed Loan Request for such Loan and the other documents and information (including, without limitation, a Compliance Certificate) as required by &#167;2.7, or a fully completed Letter of Credit Request required by &#167;2.10 in the form of Exhibit E hereto fully completed, as applicable.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1027"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="i5445306db30b4ae3aec5a09eb90591d7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;12.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">EVENTS OF DEFAULT&#59; ACCELERATION&#59; ETC.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1030"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i024d10f6bbb0434083831cfef97e74d9"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;12.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Events of Default and Acceleration</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. If any of the following events (&#8220;Events of Default&#8221; or, if the giving of notice or the lapse of time or both is required, then, prior to such notice or lapse of time, &#8220;Defaults&#8221;) shall occur&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1033"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i49573f1eedaf43b2bcedb24c0e189b25"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">Borrower shall fail to pay any principal of the Loans when the same shall become due and payable, whether at the stated date of maturity or any accelerated date of maturity or at any other date fixed for payment&#59;</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New shall become due and payable, any reimbursement obligations with respect to the Letters of Credit or any fees or other sums due hereunder (other than any voluntary prepayment) or under any of the other Loan Documents within five (5) Business Days after notice from Agent, whether at the stated date of maturity or any accelerated date of maturity or at any other date fixed for payment&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1039"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1042"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="ice7c1da09e9441b4ab458cd74dcced31"></font><font &#167;9.2, &#167;9.4, &#167;9.5, or &#167;9.9 which they are required to perform&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1045"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i0ae95e66918d495abbf207072e02436c"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">any of the Loan Parties shall fail to perform any other term, covenant or agreement contained herein or in any of the other Loan Documents which they are required to perform (other than those specified in the other subclauses of this &#167;12 (including, without limitation, &#167;12.2 below) or in the other Loan Documents), and such failure shall continue for thirty (30) days after Borrower receives from Agent written notice thereof, and in the case of a default that cannot be cured within such thirty (30)-day period despite such Loan Party&#8217;s diligent efforts but is susceptible of being cured within ninety (90) days of Borrower&#8217;s receipt of Agent&#8217;s original notice, then such Loan Party shall have such additional time as is reasonably necessary to effect such cure, but in no event in excess of ninety (90) days from Borrower&#8217;s receipt of Agent&#8217;s original notice&#59; provided that the foregoing cure provisions shall not pertain to any default consisting of a failure to comply with &#167;8.4, or to any Default excluded from any provision of cure of defaults contained in any other of the Loan Documents and with respect to any defaults under &#167;8.1, &#167;8.2 or &#167;8.8, the thirty (30) day cure period described above shall be reduced to a period of ten (10) Business Days and no additional cure period shall be provided with respect to such defaults&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1048"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i3f78e9e9d3904849aae0a16f0faf0bb7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(f)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:24.03pt">any material representation or warranty made by or on behalf of Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries in this Agreement or any other Loan Document, or any report, certificate, financial statement, request for a Loan, or in any other document or instrument delivered pursuant to or in connection with this Agreement, any advance of a Loan, or any of the other Loan Documents shall prove to have been false in any material respect upon the date when made or deemed to have been made&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1051"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i8fc43b642e4940e09d992f91541503c0"></font><font Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Borrower or any Guarantor (or Subsidiary thereof) defaults under (i) any Recourse Indebtedness in an aggregate amount equal to or greater than $75,000,000.00 with respect to all uncured defaults at any time, or (ii) any Non-Recourse Indebtedness in an aggregate amount equal to or greater than $200,000,000.00 with respect to all uncured defaults at any time&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1054"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i786cc461fc0445adbdd838f8d64b50e8"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(h)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Borrower or any Guarantor or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary (i) shall make an assignment for the benefit of creditors, or admit in writing its general inability to pay or generally fail to pay its debts as they mature or become due, or shall petition or apply for the appointment of a trustee or other custodian, liquidator or receiver for it or any substantial part of its assets, (ii) shall commence any case or other proceeding relating to it under any bankruptcy, reorganization, arrangement, insolvency, readjustment of debt, dissolution or liquidation or similar law of any jurisdiction, now or hereafter in effect, or (iii) shall take any action to authorize any of the foregoing&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1057"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font trustee or other custodian, liquidator or receiver of any of Borrower or any Guarantor, or Unencumbered Asset Subsidiary or any substantial part of the assets of any thereof, or a case or other proceeding shall be commenced against any such Person under any bankruptcy, reorganization, arrangement, </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div following the filing or commencement thereof&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1060"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font $50,000,000.00&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1066"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font law, suit in equity or other legal proceeding to cancel, revoke or rescind any of the Loan Documents shall be commenced by or on behalf of any of the Loan Parties, or any court or any other governmental or regulatory authority or agency of competent jurisdiction shall make a determination, or issue a judgment, order, decree or ruling, to the effect that any one or more of the material Loan Documents is illegal, invalid or unenforceable in accordance with the terms thereof, and in each case of the foregoing the Loan Parties fail to enter into an amendment or modification to the existing Loan Documents or enter into new documentation, each in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to Agent and Required Lenders, which have the effect of rendering the cancellation, termination, revocation, rescission, illegality, invalidity or unenforceability immaterial&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1069"></div><div terms of this Agreement or the other Loan Documents&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1072"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font cure provision set forth in &#167;12.1(e)&#59; then, and upon any such Event of Default, Agent may, and upon the request of the Required Lenders shall, by notice in writing to Borrower declare all amounts owing with respect to this Agreement, the Notes, and the other Loan Documents to be, and they shall thereupon forthwith become, immediately due and payable without presentment, demand, protest or other notice of any kind, all of which are hereby expressly waived by the Loan Parties&#59; provided that in the event of any Event of Default </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">110</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">specified in &#167;12.1(h), &#167;12.1(i) or &#167;12.1(j), all such amounts shall become immediately due and payable automatically and without any requirement of presentment, demand, protest or other notice of any kind from any Lender or Agent.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1081"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i44a65d4cd3e6488c8b6fbf968b934556"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;12.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Certain Cure Periods</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. In the event that there shall occur any Default or Event of Default that relates only to certain Unencumbered Asset(s) or the owner(s) thereof (if such owner is a Subsidiary Guarantor), then Borrower may elect to cure such Default or Event of Default (so long as no other Default or Event of Default would arise as a result of such Default or Event of Default) by electing to remove such Unencumbered Asset(s) and any applicable Subsidiary Guarantor(s) pursuant to &#167;5.4 and remove such Unencumbered Asset(s) from the calculation of the covenants in &#167;9 (and the Loan Parties&#8217; compliance with &#167;3.2 as a result thereof), in which event such removal and reduction shall be completed within thirty (30) days after receipt of notice of such Default or Event of Default from Agent or the Required Lenders.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1084"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i4ec71f1dbf3d47d3961c4600212294b5"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;12.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Termination of Commitments and Actions in Respect of Letters of Credit</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1087"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i289e90b8a2dd4cf4bc6f4179482ac7bc"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">If any one or more Events of Default specified in &#167;12.1(h), &#167;12.1(i) or &#167;12.1(j) shall occur, then immediately and without any action on the part of Agent or any Lender the Commitments shall terminate and Lenders shall be relieved of all obligations to make Loans or issue Letters of Credit for the account of Borrower. If any other Event of Default shall have occurred, Agent may, and upon the election of the Required Lenders shall, by notice to Borrower terminate the obligation to make Loans to and issue Letters of Credit for the account of Borrower. No termination under this &#167;12.3 shall relieve any Loan Party of its respective obligations to Lenders arising under this Agreement or the other Loan Documents.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1090"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i4764ee4ce3614ca38b36eb94b2eb0e44"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">If any Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing, Agent may, or shall at the request of the Required Lenders, irrespective of whether it is taking any of the actions described in &#167;12.4 or &#167;4.16(e) or otherwise, make demand upon Borrower to, and forthwith upon such demand Borrower will, pay to Agent on behalf of Lenders in same day funds at Agent&#8217;s office designated in such demand, for deposit in the LC Cash Collateral Account, an amount equal to the LC Exposure at such time. If at any time Agent or an Issuing Lender determines that any funds held in the LC Cash Collateral Account are subject to any right or claim of any Person other than Agent and Lenders with respect to the Obligations of the Loan Parties under the Loan Documents, or that the total amount of such funds is less than the LC Exposure, Borrower will, forthwith upon demand by Agent, pay to Agent, as additional funds to be deposited and held in the LC Cash Collateral Account, an amount equal to the excess of (a) the LC Exposure over (b) the total amount of funds, if any, then held in the LC Cash Collateral Account that Agent determines to be free and clear of any such right and claim. Upon the drawing of any Letter of Credit for which funds are on deposit in the LC Cash Collateral Account, such funds shall be applied to reimburse the applicable Issuing Lender or Lenders, as applicable, to the extent permitted by applicable law.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1093"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i1a722183b8f74b62ab85b9d17ea87712"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;12.4</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Remedies</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. In case any one or more Events of Default shall have occurred and be continuing, and whether or not Lenders shall have accelerated the maturity of the Loans pursuant to &#167;12.1, Agent on behalf of Lenders may, and upon the direction of the Required Lenders shall, proceed to protect and enforce their rights and remedies under this Agreement, the Notes and&#47;or any of the other Loan Documents by suit in equity, action at law or other appropriate proceeding, including to the full extent permitted by applicable law the specific performance of any covenant or agreement contained in this Agreement and the other Loan Documents, the obtaining of the ex parte appointment of a receiver, and, if any amount shall have become due, by declaration or otherwise, the enforcement of the payment thereof. No remedy herein conferred upon Agent or the holder of any Note is intended to be exclusive of any other remedy and each and every remedy shall be cumulative and shall be in addition to every other remedy given hereunder or now or hereafter existing at law or in equity or by statute or any other provision of law. </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">111</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">Notwithstanding the provisions of this Agreement providing that the Loans may be evidenced by multiple Notes in favor of Lenders, Lenders acknowledge and agree that only Agent may exercise any remedies arising by reason of a Default or Event of Default. If any Loan Party fails to perform any agreement or covenant contained in this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents beyond any applicable period for notice and cure, Agent may itself perform, or cause to be performed, any agreement or covenant of such Person contained in this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents which such Person shall fail to perform, and the out-of-pocket costs of such performance, together with any reasonable expenses, including reasonable attorneys&#8217; fees actually incurred (including attorneys&#8217; fees incurred in any appeal) by Agent in connection therewith, shall be payable by Borrower upon demand and shall constitute a part of the Obligations and shall if not paid within five (5) Business Days after demand bear interest at the rate for overdue amounts as set forth in this Agreement. In the event that all or any portion of the Obligations is collected by or through an attorney-at-law, Borrower shall pay all costs of collection including, but not limited to, reasonable and documented attorneys&#8217; fees.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1096"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="if436d6b8ad77400cad4bd237d03523b7"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;12.5</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Distribution of Loan Proceeds</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. In the event that, following the occurrence and during the continuance of any Event of Default, any monies are received in connection with the enforcement of any of the Loan Documents, such monies shall be distributed for application as follows&#58;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1099"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i1c906aacb63a480083c646e364e827a0"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">First, to the payment of, or (as the case may be) the reimbursement of Agent for or in respect of, all reasonable out-of-pocket costs, expenses, disbursements and losses which shall have been paid, incurred or sustained by Agent in accordance with the terms of the Loan Documents or in connection with the collection of such monies by Agent, for the exercise, protection or enforcement by Agent of all or any of the rights, remedies, powers and privileges of Agent or Lenders under this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents or in support of any provision of adequate indemnity to Agent against any taxes or liens which by law shall have, or may have, priority over the rights of Agent or Lenders to such monies&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1102"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="id21ac58e166943f4af9544cdf63026ec"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(b)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Second, to all other Obligations (including any Letter of Credit Liabilities, interest, expenses or other obligations incurred after the commencement of a bankruptcy and to deposit into the LC Cash Collateral Account any contingent reimbursement obligations in respect of outstanding Letters of Credit to the extent required by &#167;12.3, but excluding Hedge Obligations) in such order or preference as the Required Lenders shall determine&#59; provided, that (i) Swing Loans shall be repaid first, (ii) distributions in respect of such other Obligations shall include, on a pari passu basis, any Agent&#8217;s fee payable pursuant to &#167;4.2&#59; (iii) in the event that any Lender shall have wrongfully failed or refused to make an advance under &#167;2.5(d), &#167;2.7, or &#167;2.10(f) and such failure or refusal shall be continuing, advances made by other Lenders during the pendency of such failure or refusal shall be entitled to be repaid as to principal and accrued interest in priority to the other Obligations described in this subsection (b)&#59; and (iv) Obligations owing to Lenders with respect to each type of Obligation such as interest, principal, fees and expenses shall be made among Lenders, pro rata&#59; and provided, further that the Required Lenders may in their discretion make proper allowance to take into account any Obligations not then due and payable&#59;</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1105"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="ie6cad04241e74acfb01a613ab1b49991"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(c)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.7pt">Third, to all Hedge Obligations, on a pari passu basis among Lender Hedge Providers pro rata&#59; and</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1108"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt"><font id="i0bc165243afc40a18d8da9ad72a6450b"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">(d)</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:22.02pt">Fourth, the excess, if any, shall be returned to Borrower or to such other Persons as are legally entitled thereto.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1111"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="i9ae56a17de3840868998665596391c93"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;13.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">SETOFF</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">112</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">During the continuance of any Event of Default, any deposits (general or specific, time or demand, provisional or final, regardless of currency, maturity, or the branch where such deposits are held) or other sums credited by or due from any Lender or any Affiliate thereof to Borrower or any Subsidiary Guarantor and any securities or other property of Borrower or any Subsidiary Guarantor in the possession of such Lender or any Affiliate may, without notice to any Borrower (any such notice being expressly waived by Borrower and the Subsidiary Guarantors) but with the prior written approval of Agent, be applied to or set off against the payment of Obligations and any and all other liabilities, direct, or indirect, absolute or contingent, due or to become due, now existing or hereafter arising, of Borrower or any Subsidiary Guarantor to such Lender. Each Lender agrees with each other Lender that if such Lender shall receive from Borrower or any Subsidiary Guarantor, whether by voluntary payment, exercise of the right of setoff, or otherwise, and shall retain and apply to the payment of the Note or Notes held by such Lender (but excluding the Swing Loan Note) any amount in excess of its ratable portion of the payments received by all Lenders with respect to the Notes held by all Lenders, such Lender will make such disposition and arrangements with the other Lenders with respect to such excess, either by way of distribution, pro tanto assignment of claims, subrogation or otherwise as shall result in each Lender receiving in respect of the Notes held by it its proportionate payment as contemplated by this Agreement&#59; provided that if all or any part of such excess payment is thereafter recovered from such Lender, such disposition and arrangements shall be rescinded and the amount restored to the extent of such recovery, but without interest.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1114"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;padding-left:36pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-36pt"><font id="i1d9664d620ee4a81a1352544dfa68ae0"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;14.</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%;padding-left:15pt">AGENT</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1117"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="if3dba7d213bb480f91563971a3777bd2"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;14.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Authorization</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent is authorized to take such action on behalf of each Lender and to exercise all such powers as are hereunder and under any of the other Loan Documents and any related documents delegated to Agent and all other powers not specifically reserved to Lenders, together with such powers as are reasonably incident thereto, provided that no duties or responsibilities not expressly assumed herein or therein shall be implied to have been assumed by Agent. The obligations of Agent hereunder are primarily administrative in nature, and nothing contained in this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents shall be construed to constitute Agent as a trustee for any Lender or to create an agency or fiduciary relationship. Agent shall act as the contractual representative of Lenders hereunder, and notwithstanding the use of the term &#8220;Agent&#8221;, it is understood and agreed that Agent shall not have any fiduciary duties or responsibilities to any Lender by reason of this Agreement or any other Loan Document and is acting as an independent contractor, the duties and responsibilities of which are limited to those expressly set forth in this Agreement and the other Loan Documents. Borrower and any other Person shall be entitled to conclusively rely on a statement from Agent that it has the authority to act for and bind Lenders pursuant to this Agreement and the other Loan Documents.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1120"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i7c917fb3647645988f8fe0b9d852faaa"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;14.2</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">Employees and Agents</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent may exercise its powers and execute its duties by or through employees or agents and shall be entitled to take, and to rely on, advice of counsel concerning all matters pertaining to its rights and duties under this Agreement and the other Loan Documents. Agent may utilize the services of such Persons as Agent may reasonably determine, and all reasonable and documented fees and expenses of any such Persons shall be paid by Borrower.</font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1123"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="id259f6a0b7ce402dbe35b05f67792254"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;14.3</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">No Liability</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Neither Agent nor any of its shareholders, directors, officers or employees nor any other Person assisting them in their duties nor any agent, or employee thereof, shall be liable to Lenders for (a) any waiver, consent or approval given or any action taken, or omitted to be taken, in good faith by it or them hereunder or under any of the other Loan </font></div><div style="height:72pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">113</font></div><div><font><br></font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:72pt;width:100%"><div><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">Documents, or in connection herewith or therewith, or be responsible for the consequences of any oversight or error of judgment whatsoever, except that Agent or such other Person, as the case may be, shall be liable for losses due to its willful misconduct or gross negligence as finally determined by a court of competent jurisdiction after the expiration of all applicable appeal periods or (b) any action taken or not taken by Agent with the consent or at the request of the Required Lenders or the Required Class Lenders or such greater number of Lenders as may be required hereunder. Agent shall not be deemed to have knowledge or notice of the occurrence of any Default or Event of Default, except with respect to defaults in the payment of principal, interest and fees required to be paid to Agent for the account of Lenders, unless Agent has received notice from a Lender or Borrower referring to the Loan Documents and describing with reasonable specificity such Default or Event of Default and stating that such notice is a &#8220;notice of default&#8221;. </font></div><div id="i7793ba7c617d4c2b81e8fe0c2d6c103b_1126"></div><div style="margin-bottom:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt"><font id="i6edf69e717074ac293ec0022e761bf5d"></font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#167;14.4</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;padding-left:9pt;text-decoration:underline">No Representations</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',sans-serif;font-size:12pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">. Agent shall not be responsible for the execution or validity or enforceability of this Agreement, the Notes, any of the other Loan Documents or any instrument at any time constituting, or intended to constitute, collateral security for the Notes, or for the value of any such collateral security or for the validity, enforceability or collectability of any such amounts owing with respect to the Notes, or for any recitals or statements, warranties or representations made herein, or any agreement, instrument or certificate delivered in connection therewith or in any of the other Loan Documents or in any certificate or instrument hereafter furnished to it by or on behalf of Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries, or be bound to ascertain or inquire as to the performance or observance of any of the terms, conditions, covenants or agreements herein or in any of the other Loan Documents. Agent shall not be bound to ascertain whether any notice, consent, waiver or request delivered to it by any Loan Party or any holder of any of the Notes shall have been duly authorized or is true, accurate and complete. Agent has not made nor does it now make any representations or warranties, express or implied, nor does it assume any liability to Lenders, with respect to the creditworthiness or financial condition of Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries, or the value of any assets of Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries. Each Lender acknowledges that it has, independently and without reliance upon Agent or any other Lender, and based upon such information and documents as it has deemed appropriate, made its own credit analysis and decision to enter into this Agreement. Each Lender also acknowledges that it will, independently and without reliance upon Agent or any other Lender, based upon such information and documents as it deems appropriate at the time, continue to make its own credit analysis and decisions in taking or not taking action under this Agreement and the other Loan Documents.
